organisation_name: The International Association of Independent Tanker Owners (INTERTANKO)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: High Level Steering Group for Governance of the Digital Maritime System and Services#E03450#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3450#Observer#C#Cooperation group on Places of Refuge#Stakeholders Advisory Group on Maritime Security #E01087#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1087#Member#C
membership: INTERTANKO together with BIMCO, INTERCARGO and The International Chamber of Shipping/the International Shipping Federation form the Round Table of International Shipping Associations.
goals__remit: INTERTANKO has been the voice of independent tanker owners since 1970.  It is a professional association representing an industry dedicated to delivering reliable, safe, responsible and competitive service transporting the liquid energy and chemicals that keep the world economy running.
